alert.note: Alert for Chase (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 26 at 3:08PM CDT until May 27 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kansas... Cottonwood River at Cottonwood Falls affecting Chase County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Cottonwood River near Florence affecting Marion County. Cottonwood River near Plymouth affecting Lyon and Chase Counties. For the Cottonwood River...including Florence, Cottonwood Falls, Plymouth...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cottonwood River at Cottonwood Falls. * WHEN...From late tonight to tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Flooding of low-lying areas and cropland can be expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 8.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.0 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Cottonwood River Cottonwood Fall 9.0 8.3 Thu 1 pm CDT 8.3 6.8 4.3 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
